values: Marriage: Pursuing Conformity to Christ in the CovenantMarriage: Pursuing Conformity to Christ in the Covenant

Grace is not just forgiving and forbearing but also changing to become more like Jesus. John Piper preaches a sermon about marriage from Ephesians 5.Grace is not just forgiving and forbearing but also changing to become more like Jesus. John Piper preaches a sermon about marriage from Ephesians 5.
